item.title: Making people donors ? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

Fucktopia that is an ugly character save. So that’s what PI deals with…? :S

Read full topic

item.title: Making people donors ? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @NDW NDW
item.description:
@NDW wrote:

Hee,

I’ll quote something from your charac fils.
" Sara-KC = 0

pk-points = 99985130

isDonator = 1 <—
donatorChest = 100000000
slayerTask = 0
"
I bold the words you have to look on. You’d see isDonator = 1
A normal player would have isDonator = 0 , to make him donator just change the zero into 1.

I hope this would help u out =D
Greetz,
NDW

Read full topic
